data.name: HYPER DRIVE ‚ö†Ô∏è The Insane Gravity Race
data.detailed_description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators. Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give. Have fun playing - DRUNKEN APES



The game offers 13 crazy tracks and we are continuously working on more awesome tracks and gravity bending hyper speed areas.
Currently, there are 9 unique hyper speed cars in the game. Every car has a different handling and requires a different skill level and experience. Finding the perfect car for your driving style will be essential to set new high scores and beat your friends and other competitors.

HYPER DRIVE does not only come with the fastest cars and the weirdest and most unique tracks you can find in a racing game, it also can be played in 3 different game modes:

üî∏ Do you like it hard? Do you think hard is too casual? DO YOU LIKE HYPER? Try the HYPER MODE, finish a lab without dying in order to beat the high score!
üî∏ Practice the labs and car handling in the PRACTICE MODE.
üî∏ We are currently working on the TIME MODE. It is much more forgiving and lets you respawn once you have died.



üî∏ 13 crazy tracks
üî∏ 9 cars with different speed and handling
üî∏ artistic surroundings and track design
üî∏ HYPER GRAVITY
üî∏ several game modes
üî∏ unique stylized speed experience

Each of the modes above can be played alone or with your friends in split screen (coming soon)

data.short_description: HYPER DRIVE - The Insane Gravity Race - the racing game with unlimited speed boosts! IT'S TIME TO GET HYPER!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or better
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Strictly recommended ;)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
